28#include "includes.h"
29__RCSID("$NetBSD: auth2-none.c,v 1.11 2019/01/27 02:08:33 pgoyette Exp $");
30#include <sys/types.h>
31#include <stdarg.h>
32#include <stdio.h>
33
34#include "xmalloc.h"
35#include "sshkey.h"
36#include "hostfile.h"
37#include "auth.h"
38#include "packet.h"
39#include "log.h"
40#include "misc.h"
41#include "servconf.h"
42#include "compat.h"
43#include "ssh2.h"
44#include "ssherr.h"
45#ifdef GSSAPI
46#include "ssh-gss.h"
47#endif
48#include "monitor_wrap.h"
49
50/* import */
51extern ServerOptions options;
52
53/* "none" is allowed only one time */
54static int none_enabled = 1;
55
56static int
57userauth_none(struct ssh *ssh)
58{
59 int r;
60
61 none_enabled = 0;
62 if ((r = sshpkt_get_end(ssh)) != 0)
63 fatal("%s: %s", __func__, ssh_err(r));
64 if (options.permit_empty_passwd && options.password_authentication)
65 return (PRIVSEP(auth_password(ssh, "")));
66 return (0);
67}
68
69Authmethod method_none = {
70 "none",
71 userauth_none,
72 &none_enabled
73};
74
